translations.chinese: 令諸侯子在關中者皆集櫟陽為衛。
translations.english: He ordered all the feudal lords' sons in Guanzhong to assemble at Queyang as guards.

translations.chinese: 引水灌廢丘，廢丘降，章邯自殺。
translations.english: He diverted water to flood Feiqiu. Feiqiu surrendered. Zhang Han committed suicide.

translations.chinese: 雍州定，八十餘縣，置河上、渭南、中地、隴西、上郡。
translations.english: Yong province was pacified with over 80 counties. He established Heshang, Weinan, Zhongdi, Longxi, and Shangjun commanderies.

translations.chinese: 令祠官祀天地四方上帝山川，以時祠之。
translations.english: He ordered the ritual officials to sacrifice to Heaven, Earth, the Four Directions, Supreme Deities, mountains, and rivers, making sacrifices at the proper times.
He raised Guanzhong troops to garrison the border fortifications.
